title: PUBG Players Masters Invitational Broadcast & Co-Streamers
contents: We are excited to share the full broadcast and co-streaming details for the PUBG Players Masters Invitational, coming to you live from PUBG Seongsu on December 19th‚Äì21st!¬†Alongside the official broadcast across global platforms, we are teaming up with an extended lineup of partner streamers and creators to bring the action to even more fans around the world. With both our multilingual broadcast team and a diverse roster of co-streamers, you‚Äôll be able to enjoy the tournament in the same TPP view you play, from wherever you are.¬†Today, we are thrilled to reveal the broadcast channel and co-streamer lineup joining us for the PUBG Players Masters Invitational.¬†Official Broadcast (English)Twitch / Twitch Map feedYouTube / Youtube Map feedTikTokXKick¬†Regional ChannelsKoreanYouTube CHZZK SOOP NaverTVChineseDOUYU HUYA BILIBILI WEIBO TIKTOKChinese (Chinese Taipei)TwitchThaiFacebook YouTube Twitch TikTok SOOPVietnameseYouTube TikTok Facebook NimoTVIndonesianYouTubeRussianTwitch YouTube VkTurkishKick Twitch YouTube XPortuguese (Brazil)Twitch YouTube Instagram Tiktok X¬†Co-StreamersKoreaÏò§ÏïÑ Î∞ïÏÇ¨Ïû• Ï£ºÌÇ§Îãà Ïù¥ÏÉÅÌò∏ ÏàòÌîº Ïä§Îßµ Ïù¥ÏßÄÏÉÅ Ïö∏ÌîÑ Ïù¥Îã§ Í≥†ÏÑ∏Íµ¨ ÏßïÎ≤ÑÍ±∞ ÏôìÍµ¨ÌôçÍ∏∏Îèô ÏïÑÏïº AYA Î¨≠Ïî® ÎèÑÏßÄÏú† Í∏∞ÏÇ¨Ìòï ÎÇòÏ†úÎ°úÏûÑ ÌñâÎ≥µÌîåÎûú 323 ÏôÄÏÇ¨ÎπÑ ÎãπÍ∑ºÏπ¥Î†å ÍπÄÍ≥ºÏ†ú ÏàòÎîîÏàòÎîîÏù¥ Ï≤úÎÑ§ÏïÑ ÏõêÏ∞å ÍπÄÏÑ†ÎÇ® ÏΩîÏΩîÏñëThailandTANX MinORu Ezqelusia FifaTargreanVietnamTUI T√äN B√î Nhism Chip Gaming Bomman Dev NguyenBrazilSkipnho BURGAOfps Dilera AxtlolMake sure you‚Äôre following @pubgesports on social media to stay updated on the latest news and coverage throughout the invitational.

title: PUBG Players Masters Invitational Participating Teams & Players
contents: We are excited to reveal the full list of participating teams and players for the PUBG Players Masters Invitational.¬†This year's Invitational brings together 16 teams from AM, EMEA, APAC, China, and Korea ‚Äî all gathering in Seoul to compete in full TPP over three days.¬†Additionally, participating players will provide personal POV livestreams, offering fans a new way to watch every perspective throughout the Invitational.¬†Streaming links for each player will be available by clicking on their names in the roster below. (Streaming links will continue to be updated as confirmations are completed.)¬†Please note that some players may appear on rosters outside of their primary organizations due to regional availability, special invitations, or team-based arrangements specific to this Invitational.¬†Here is the complete roster of teams and players who will take the stage in Seoul.AmericaTeam FalconshwinnShrimzyTGLTNKickstartFURIAcauan7zinguizeraa237possazkrakeNEMEANatus VincereSosedHakatoryFeyeristext4nzTwisted MindsBatulinSLuMolodoctxmplAPAC¬†¬†VietnamThe ExpendablesDelwynTanVuuCloriesDuCkHjeUzAnyone‚Äôs LegendHimassSololzyseoulwicked¬†¬†¬†ThailandeArenaNourinzOHPONDZJacobLericzFW EsportsBanana0neCONAXYrEiizSixSackz¬†¬†ChinaPetrichor RoadCui71MMingAZi26v617GamingLilghost77owoXbeixwuddFour Angry MenLongzATongMuuxxxLuShenJDG EsportsSpaceManDec12thSuZeCold119¬†¬†KoreaDN FREECSHeavenSaluteGyuminDIELGen G.TosiBeaNOrcaF1ameT1Rain1ngEENDTYPEHEATHERBaegopaPioSeongjangParkproAKaN¬†Broadcast details will be announced soon on the official PUBG Esports channels.Read the announcement on our website as well: https://pubgesports.com/en/news/9627

title: PUBG Global Championship 2025 Opening Ceremony Announcement
ENTERING ERANGEL: SUBZERO - The Cold is Coming
contents: Erangel: Subzero ‚Ä¶Everything began with a twisted ambition to turn the Battlegrounds into something far more unforgiving. During a clandestine experiment, a catastrophic failure sent multiple Tythonic Satellites crashing down onto Erangel. The impact ruptured the Satellites and released cryogenic gas, which soon spread across the island. The Blue Zone was not spared from its influence, and Erangel‚Äôs climate began to warp under the growing chill. The crash sites froze over, and the island soon found itself gripped by sudden, severe changes in weather. Now, you must fight to survive in Erangel‚Äôs frigid and treacherous landscape‚Äîand remember that this marks only the beginning of a long and unforgiving winter.. Area Modifications Several areas across Erangel have changed following Satellite crashes. Stalber Stalber, where magnetic field experiments were being conducted, has frozen over due to the cryogenic gas leaking from the crashed Satellite. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27971017/e39fcea017ee0611489fb494c9c0ef4902b72c93.jpg {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27971017/74feb59904d5b265d8f8ecd52cc9975a7aa379d1.jpg Shelter Shelter, once a hidden storage site for the Tythonic Satellites, now stands among the places where those Satellites have crashed back to earth. Rumor has it some of them hold valuable loot. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27971017/a810058e82efbaf56838146e59e99abedcc14484.jpg Sosnovka Military Base & Boatyard These two areas have also undergone drastic changes. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27971017/b684c29ca130e639462080209866e31c43c8c6f7.jpg Other Areas {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27971017/6d5414e62395af2379d79c3d58619e5a8110fab1.jpg The bridge leading to Sosnovka Military Base has partially collapsed following a Satellite crash. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27971017/f07757f7138bd39081ce61c62e097e3a0f83f02b.jpg The southwestern plain of Erangel has also seen major changes. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27971017/4c54f174fc522818b87381746f754bb6b53ccb47.jpg Wreckage from crashed Satellites can be found in certain areas. Several rivers have frozen over due to the sharp drop in temperature. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27971017/014edc3266721d8494ebebeb1ac0f268f89493c2.jpg Snow piling up across Erangel has also altered parts of the terrain. Blue Zone ‚Äª The following changes apply to all modes except Team Deathmatch. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27971017/cdcbfe567c49a363b1f5ffaa374dcd9744f49bcc.jpg A freezing effect has been added. The damage, speed, and radius of the Blue Zone remain unchanged. New visual and sound effects have been added, varying by the level of Blue Zone damage. The freezing effect is not blocked by the Jammer Pack. The above changes also apply to both the BZ Grenade and the BZ Grenade Launcher. BZ Grenade A freezing effect has been added to the Blue Zone sphere generated upon throwing. This effect functions the same way as that of the Blue Zone. New Weapon: BZ Grenade Launcher Introducing a single-shot, break-open launcher found only in Erangel: Subzero. Use the BZ Grenade Launcher to pressure enemies or block their vision! {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27971017/fe4537f157806e32411ac1f9cf76436f6e163a55.jpg Inventory slot: Secondary Weapons Ammo: 40mm BZ Grenade Ammo weight: 20 When attached to a surface such as an object, the ground, wall, or roof, a Blue Zone sphere with a 7.5 m radius is created after a short delay. The sphere is less powerful than the one created by the BZ Grenade, dealing 8 damage per second. A warning sound plays before the sphere is generated. Does not activate when landing on water. 2-3 rounds spawn together with the BZ Grenade Launcher. Spawns in the World, Secret Rooms, and from Satellites. Weather Experience completely different weather conditions caused by the climate change. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27971017/0d8ba05b2ebcb2294a852b48dcc3d535b1765543.jpg A faint chill can be felt in the air, though the skies remain clear for now. Applies to Arcade only. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27971017/5f17276af60930b27d85f0273672ff125f400d77.jpg Snowflakes begin to fall, gradually covering the ground. With the Dynamic Weather feature enabled, changing winter conditions unfold across the Battlegrounds. Applies to Normal Match, Ranked, and Custom Match. Spawn Changes The Vikendi Ghillie Suit now spawns in Secret Rooms, Care Packages, and special airdrops. The world spawn rate of the M79 has been increased. The world spawn rates of the P1911, P92, and R1895 have been slightly reduced. Map {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27971017/8372346587cf957b67fb0d0f16bfe95aed0a975e.jpg The World Map and Minimap have been updated in alignment with the above changes. Miscellaneous Due to the aftermath of the Satellite crash, the Red Zone has been disabled. The rivers and sea have frozen, temporarily suspending ferry operations. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27971017/7f39af53e16b2d4a9bd936ddf58b5ee937666ae8.jpg Airplanes operating over Erangel have received visual changes. When parachuting, visibility may be reduced due to changing weather conditions. Update 39.1 brings a harsh winter to Erangel, PUBG‚Äôs most iconic battleground....

title: PUBG x Porsche Web Event Winners
PUBG's extraction shooter spin-off, Black Budget, is finally going to be playable next month
contents: You‚Äôd be forgiven for not remembering PUBG: Black Budget, the extraction off-shoot of the original battle royale shooter, PUBG. Black Budget has been sort of floating around the internet for months, but Krafton never really committed to revealing core details about the game, or when players will actually get to play it. Read more

title: Dev Letter: Anti-Cheat Improvements and Actions for Fair Play
BATTLEGROUNDS Plus Discount: Celebrating the Console Service Transition
PUBG x Porsche
contents: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27971017/0aa5fa94ce39900c65649dba8646d3f2a015eb77.jpg Porsche in PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS Elegance in motion, refined performance, and timeless design ‚Äî Porsche arrives on the Battlegrounds. The balance of emotion and engineering, power encased in elegance. Porsche has always embodied the perfect harmony between sporty performance and everyday comfort. This dedication to craftsmanship, where every detail pursues perfection, elevates Porsche beyond a mere vehicle, transforming it into a moving piece of art. Through the PUBG x Porsche collaboration, you can experience Porsche's high-end lineup, each model boasting a unique charm. Discover the Panamera Turbo S, which sets the standard for luxury sedans with its innovative performance and unparalleled comfort; the 911 Carrera GTS, the quintessential sports car that combines thrilling performance with everyday practicality; and the Cayenne Turbo GT, where SUV versatility meets racing DNA for unmatched power. Experience the true Porsche driving sensation on the Battlegrounds. With Porsche, where performance meets elegance, every moment on the Battlegrounds becomes art. Read the full announcement here!

title: Recent Anti-Cheat Measures on Console Platforms
PUBG x G-DRAGON Web Event
contents: Enter the PUBG x G-DRAGON Lucky Draw for a chance to win limited-edition goods! Even if you‚Äôre not a PUBG player, anyone can enter with just an email address. Verifying your PUBG account will increase your chances of winning! What's more, you can also download collaboration images from the PUBG x G-DRAGON Gallery!¬†How to EnterEvent Page: https://pubg.com/events/g-dragonxpubgVerify your email address or log in with your KRAFTON ID after following the link to enter the lucky draw.Entering the page via the lobby banner will log you in automatically.Users who join via email not linked to a PUBG account will receive 1 entry ticket.Users who have linked their PUBG accounts with KRAFTON ID, or participate directly with a PUBG account, can receive up to 2 entry tickets.The winners will be announced after the lucky draw ends. Don‚Äôt forget to check the results via the event page or the email you used to enter!Check out the event page to access a detailed compilation of all necessary information and guidelines for each event.RewardsPUBG x G-DRAGON Ultimate Set with Autographed Album (1 winner)PUBG x G-DRAGON Special Set (10 winners)G-DRAGON PEACEMINUSONE SET (30 winners)G-DRAGON - Pan (100 winners)500 G-Coin (7 Days) (500 winners)Event Schedule (UTC)Participation PeriodPC/Console: September 10, 07:00 - September 23, 07:00Winners AnnouncementSeptember 30, 07:00Shipping Information SubmissionSeptember 30, 07:00 - October 27, 07:00Reward DistributionIf you win in-game item rewards, a redeem code will be sent to the email address used for entry.On the Results popup, you can select your preferred platform to receive your redeem code.Physical rewards will be sent sequentially starting from October 27.We will send a separate notification email to the address you used for entry.¬†Please check your email inbox carefully.

title: Tune Into the Next Global Showdown: Esports World Cup 2025!
Dev Letter: Introducing a New Anti-Cheat Solution
PUBG bans 22,000 players in a week, including 6,000 who killed their teammates
contents: Cheaters are the scourge of any multiplayer game. Whether you're teaming up with your paints or launching a solo mission against the world, coming across a cheater will put a stop to your fun like a wallhacking bullet to your skull. Even worse is team killing, where your teammates get mad for no discernible reason and throw your entire match by killing you or another teammate. Thankfully, PUBG Battlegrounds is taking swift and decisive action against cheaters, team killers, and more online degenerates, banning over 22,000 accounts last week alone. Read the rest of the story... RELATED LINKS: Best mobile games on PC 2025 PUBG system requirements Best PUBG settings for PC and Steam Deck
